2065660.name: THE GAME OF LIFE 2: Sweet Haven World
2065660.description:
Master the art of candycraft when you live in the Sweet Haven World! New outfits, vehicles, jobs and more await in this syrupy sweet new expansion for The Game of Life 2.

Go to the Candy College and graduate as a Cake Designer, or go straight into a job and become a Candy Shop Clerk. Choose to get married on the Wedding Cake, or stay single and adopt a dog or cat from the Cookie Pet Centre! Buy the delicious Croissant Cottage, or save up for the Macaron Mansion. You can even add a little sparkle to the world from atop the Lollipop Lighthouse!

Play with your friends and family in a land like no other. Be sweet, be spectacular and add a little sugar to your life choices!

INCLUDES:

  • A NEW WORLD TO EXPLORE – Make life that much sweeter with a trip to the Sweet Haven World!

  • THEMED COSMETICS – Six sweet outfits, six sugar-coated avatars and four heroic vehicles.

  • CRAFT YOUR STORY – Savour the flavour of success, however that tastes for you! Build a sweet career or cook up some romance!

Create a warm, wholesome slice of life and add the Sweet Haven World to your collection!
2065660.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
